snippet: Single-digit temperatures and a break from school forced New Yorkers to improvise ways to keep children occupied.
abstract: Parents throughout New York City face double challenge of extended winter school break and record-breaking cold that makes outdoor activities downright dangerous; indoor playdates, movies and video games become the focus in homes across area as temperatures drop.

byline.contributor: Zach Crizer, J. David Goodman and Nate Schweber contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Single-digit temperatures and a break from school forced New Yorkers to improvise ways to keep children occupied.

headline.main: In Bitter Cold, Entertaining Children With Games, Films and Dumplings
headline.print_headline: In Bitter Cold, Entertaining Children With Games, Films and Dumplings
